name: CUSTOM NAME NECKLACE
description: Create a unique custom name necklace for yourself or for a loved one. I design and hand make these custom pure sterling silver pieces in my bondi Beach studio. 1. Email the NAME to hilaryandjune@mail.com or click on "contact" on the main page and fill in the form to send your request. 2. Make payment of $124.00 through checkout. 3. Then Hilary&June will create your unique custom order and send it in the mail within 2 weeks of receiving payment. (if you need it quicker please let me know) Dimensions: The name pendant is approximately 5mm each letter in width and 5mm in height. The length of the name pendant depends on how many letters are in the name. For example, a four letter name, for example "Zara", is 20mm in width and 20mm in height. The pendant is 1.5mm in thickness The chain is sterling silver and is 45cm/18inches in length. (If you would like another length please let me know. Contact Hilary&June Jewellery with any questions or requests. Subscribe to Hilary&June Jewellery's newsletter: Subscribe here!

name: STERLING SILVER FROG PENDANT NECKLACE
description: STERLING SILVER FROG PENDANT NECKLACE Design is handmade and designed by Hilary Ottens, aka Hilary&June, in her Bondi Beach studio in Australia. Dimensions: Frog Pendant:925 (sterling silver) Thickness: 1.5mm Width: 7/8th of an inch/2.5cm Height:1.5 inches Snake Chain: 925 (sterling silver) 18 inches/45cm All jewellery items come in a jewellery velvet pouch and a gift bag. I use a metal sheet of sterling silver 925 and a tiny little piercing saw (0.7mm) to make the shape. I then file, sand and polish the piece to perfection! I then get a wax mold made out of the original design and then cast from the wax mold. All my designs are made in my home studio in Bondi Beach, Sydney, Australia overlooking the waves! I take custom requests, orders for stores, corporate functions etc. Please feel free to contact me anytime for a chat or a personal request. Please read the "Payments, Shipping, Refunds and Exchanges Policy" which is found on the front page in the right column. INSPIRATION. DESIGN. PIERCE. FILE. POLISH. CHERRY ON TOP. description:
GIFT CERTIFICATE to Hilary&June Give the gift of handcrafted and custom jewellery! Perfect for anyone who loves handmade items. All items are designed and made by hand by Hilary Ottens, aka Hilary&June, in her Bondi Beach studio in Australia. ***You can choose the amount you want to give.*** All gift certificates come in a Hilary&June gift bag. The gift certificate can be redeemed at any time up to a year after issue from the Hilary&June website: www.hilaryandjune.com. The gift certificate is valid for any item they choose. All jewellery items are handstamped with an official sterling silver (925) stamp on its backside. All jewellery items come in a jewellery black velvet bag and a jewellery gift bag.
